description:
Konohamaru, Moegi, and Udon are shocked to see the disaster that has struck their home village. But to fulfill their duties as genin, each races out to direct the villagers to a safe location.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ein kleiner Held mit großem Mut
Mon prénom est Sarutobi, mon nom Konohamaru
Sei wa Sarutobi, Na wa Konohamaru!
Surname is Sarutobi, given name is Konohamaru
姓は猿飛, 名は木ノ葉丸!
